# Jon Gerton - Web Developer

Jon Gerton is a web developer based in Alaska, dedicated to helping local businesses establish a robust online presence. With a focus on **affordable WordPress sites** and **custom web applications**, he aims to provide tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of each client. Jon's extensive experience and commitment to clear communication make him a valuable partner for businesses looking to grow in the digital space.

## About

This page highlights Jon's background and approach to web development. After transitioning from a career in systems/network administration to software development, Jon has spent over a decade delivering projects across various industries. His mission is to bridge the gap between advanced tech and the essential web solutions needed by local businesses.

- **Experience:** 27 years in tech, over 18 in web development.
- **Philosophy:** Solutions should meet the client's specific needs, whether it's a simple website or a complex application.
- **Ongoing Support:** Jon ensures that clients receive help even after project completion.

### Links
- [View My Work](/projects)

## Services

This page outlines the range of services offered by Jon Gerton. He specializes in:

### $500 WordPress Sites
Perfect for local businesses needing a quick, professional web presence.

- Fast turnarounds (5 business days)
- Mobile-friendly, SEO-optimized designs
- One round of revisions included
- Ongoing support after launch

### Custom Web Applications
For businesses needing tailored solutions.

- Built on a modern tech stack (React, Next.js, Node)
- Custom features and scalable architecture
- Comprehensive training and documentation

### Team Growth Accelerator
Support for engineering teams looking to enhance their skills.

- Mentorship, code reviews, and performance optimization
- Flexibility in working arrangements (remote/on-site)

### Frequently Asked Questions
- Typical turnaround for WordPress sites is 5 business days.
- Offers ongoing maintenance and training for WordPress users.

### Links
- [Get Your $500 Site](/services)
- [Schedule a Free Consultation](/contact)

## Contact

This page serves as a point of contact for potential clients. Jon encourages visitors to reach out to discuss upcoming projects or to schedule a consultation.

- **Message Form:** Visitors can send details about their project and expect a response within 1 business day.
- **Schedule a Call:** Quick 15-minute calls available for immediate inquiries.
- **Contact Options:**
  - Email: [jon@jpgerton.com](mailto:jon@jpgerton.com)
  - GitHub: [@jgerton](https://github.com/jgerton)
  - LinkedIn: [Jon Gerton](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

2. Respond with next steps or questions.
